Factsheet

Description

Target Party is a fast paced first person platformer where your objective is to reach the goal as fast as possible as you break every target .

History

Target Party was born in my mind some years ago playing similar games. I started working on it on February 2023 and since then I have been developing it and showing it on itch.io As the summer comes the development will accelerate since I am developing the game while attending to University

Features

  • Fast-paced Gameplay
  • Responsive movement
  • Online Leaderboard
  • In-game Timer

About Pepe Coral

Boilerplate
I'm Pepe Coronil, also known as Pepe Coral, a passionate video game designer and programmer.I'm working on a new project called Target Party, which promises to be a fast-paced and exciting first person platformer. I am constantly learning and improving my skills. I look forward to continuing to grow as a videogame developer as I'm dedicated to creating innovative and captivating games that players will love.
